name: Custom Status slash commands
objective: Verifying the slash commands for setting and clearing a custom status
precondition:
• Logged in
  • Custom statuses enabled on the server

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. In the channel input field, type:

    /status [emoji_name] [status_message]
    (e.g. /status üòÉ Feeling happy )

  2. Click Enter
inline.expectedResult:
• Custom status is successfully set
  • System message is shown:
    Your status is set to ‚ÄúüòÉ Feeling happy‚Äù. You can change your status from the status popover in the channel sidebar header.

inline.description:
In the channel input field, type:

/status clear
inline.expectedResult:
• Custom status is successfully cleared

    Your status was cleared.
